metadata.synopsis: One-linerSteel Watchers in the Streets minibooster.At Blushing MermaidOne of traders - NOTE Please rename to Rox Flunter.

0.speaker: Rox Flunter
0.text: The Fists don't swagger so much without their steel muscle to back them up.

1.speaker: Rox Flunter
1.text: Helm's glory! The finest Marsember Ice Wine, and these Fists want to confiscate it? I doubt their palates would even appreciate it!
